1.name: Discovery
1.description: Learn to play progressively. Reach the goal in 10 turns or more.

2.name: Normal
2.description: Learn to play progressively. Reach the goal in 10 turns.

3.name: Competitive
3.description: You must have learned normal games ! Compete with others to control the StigmaReine (central board) and unlock special actions. Reach the goal in 10 turns.

4.name: No Limit
4.description: You must have learned normal games ! Compete with others to control the StigmaReine (central board) and unlock special actions. Reach the goal in 10 turns or more. Unleash the wind power. All actions will be possible.

5.name: Solo No Limit
5.description: Solo No Limit : Play with No Limit rules without central board, but you automatically gain 9 actions in the first 9 turns.

1.message: Discovery is available in training only

2.message: Normal is available in training only

3.message: Competitive modes are not for solo play

4.message: Competitive modes are not for solo play

5.message: Solo modes are for solo play

501.name: Random VertigHaineuse
501.description: Random VertigHaineuse (#1->#6) : Green, violet, and orange petals.

503.name: Random SiffloChamp
503.description: Random SiffloChamp (#13->#18) : Black and white petals.

504.name: Random DentDîne
504.description: Random DentDîne (#19->#24) : Pink petals and permanent moves.

505.name: Random InspirActrice
505.description: Random InspirActrice (#24->#30): Each variety of petals.

506.name: Random Competitive
506.description: WARNING: Competitive schemas cannot be fulfilled except in Competitive modes. A random playable schema will be selected in other cases.

values.description: 0 Joker to use in the game
1 Joker to use in the game. Optional but designed to help fight bad luck. Its use will result in a defeat in the event of a tie.
